name: Rhaphidophora Decursiva

watering: Water when the top inch of soil is dry to the touch; do not overwater.

soil: Use a well-draining potting mix to prevent waterlogging and root rot.

toxic: Contains calcium oxalate crystals, which are toxic if ingested by pets.

extra_care_tip: Wipe leaves with a damp cloth to remove dust and promote photosynthesis.
